mapper.insert: INSERT INTO g_account ( g_account_id , sd_elect_res_acc_id , f_case_num , f_case_year , f_code , f_full_code , f_name , f_parent , f_full_name , f_level , f_is_detail , f_dc , f_cate_name , f_proj_count , f_proj_type1 , f_proj_type2 , f_proj_type3 , f_proj_type4 , f_proj_Type5 , f_proj_Type6 , f_is_used , f_std_code , f_is_tran , f_root ) VALUES ( #{gaccountId} , #{sdElectResAccId} , #{fcaseNum} , #{fcaseYear} , #{fcode} , #{ffullCode} , #{fname} , #{fparent} , #{ffullName} , #{flevel} , #{fisDetail} , #{fdc} , #{fcateName} , #{fprojCount} , #{fprojType1} , #{fprojType2} , #{fprojType3} , #{fprojType4} , #{fprojType5} , #{fprojType6} , #{fisUsed} , #{fstdCode} , #{fisTran} , #{froot} )

INSERT INTO g_account ( sd_elect_res_acc_id , f_case_num , f_case_year , f_code , f_full_code , f_name , f_parent , f_full_name , f_level , f_is_detail , f_dc , f_cate_name , f_proj_count , f_proj_type1 , f_proj_type2 , f_proj_type3 , f_proj_type4 , f_proj_Type5 , f_proj_Type6 , f_is_used , f_std_code , f_is_tran , f_root ) VALUES
( #{item.sdElectResAccId} , #{item.fcaseNum} , #{item.fcaseYear} , #{item.fcode} , #{item.ffullCode} , #{item.fname} , #{item.fparent} , #{item.ffullName} , #{item.flevel} , #{item.fisDetail} , #{item.fdc} , #{item.fcateName} , #{item.fprojCount} , #{item.fprojType1} , #{item.fprojType2} , #{item.fprojType3} , #{item.fprojType4} , #{item.fprojType5} , #{item.fprojType6} , #{item.fisUsed} , #{item.fstdCode} , #{item.fisTran} , #{item.froot} )
mapper.update: UPDATE g_account ga , p_tran_gl_tpl pt ,p_std_account psa SET ga.f_std_code = pt.f_code WHERE ga.f_full_name LIKE pt.f_name AND ga.sd_elect_res_acc_id=#{sdElectResAccId} and pt.f_code = psa.f_code and psa.f_rule in (#{fRule},3)

UPDATE g_account ga , g_account gc SET ga.f_std_code = gc.f_std_code WHERE ga.f_std_code IS NULL AND ga.sd_elect_res_acc_id=#{sdElectResAccId} AND ga.f_parent = gc.f_code AND gc.sd_elect_res_acc_id=#{sdElectResAccId}
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) as g_account_id FROM g_account WHERE f_std_code IS NULL AND sd_elect_res_acc_id=#{sdElectResAccId}
mapper.update:
UPDATE g_account
f_case_num = #{fcaseNum},
f_case_year = #{fcaseYear},
f_full_code = #{ffullCode},
f_name = #{fname},
f_parent = #{fparent},
f_full_name = #{ffullName},
f_level = #{flevel},
f_is_detail = #{fisDetail},
f_dc = #{fdc},
f_cate_name = #{fcateName},
f_proj_count = #{fprojCount},
f_proj_type1 = #{fprojType1},
f_proj_type2 = #{fprojType2},
f_proj_type3 = #{fprojType3},
f_proj_type4 = #{fprojType4},
f_proj_Type5 = #{fprojType5},
f_proj_Type6 = #{fprojType6},
f_is_used = #{fisUsed},
f_std_code = #{fstdCode},
f_is_tran = #{fisTran},
f_root = #{froot},
WHERE sd_elect_res_acc_id = #{sdElectResAccId} and f_code = #{fcode}
mapper.delete: UPDATE g_account set state='X' WHERE g_account_id = #{gaccountId}
